name: speed-friending-w-esn
description: even"we are lucky to live in a time in which it is possible to keep in touch very easily thanks to technology. so, why not to exploit technology and meet new people? esn trento is proud to invite you to the speed friending (zoom edition). youll get in touch with other participants, where youll have the opportunity to chat to one another. each conversation will last no longer than 10 minutes, in order to allow everyone to communicate. nothing forbids you to have longer conversations afterwards! so use wisely your 10 minutes in case.
